title: Route Order to Optimal DC
description: An e-commerce order is placed. The system must decide which distribution center (DC) to fulfill it from to minimize shipping cost and time.

tasks.description: A new order is received with a specific customer delivery address.
The system checks inventory availability for the ordered items at all DCs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system finds that three different DCs have the items in stock.

tasks.description: The system calculates the shipping cost and transit time from each of the three DCs to the customer's address.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system gets shipping estimates from all three potential origin points.

tasks.description: The system selects the DC that offers the lowest shipping cost and routes the order there for fulfillment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is automatically sent to the most cost-effective DC.
